languages.text: "Глядите-ка, великий хормейстер испугался моих шепотков!" {n}Идира заходится заливистым смехом. Кажется, что ей даже слишком весело.{/n} "Не трясись так, старый. Уберегу тебя и дружков твоих пучеглазых от того, что за дверкой, спасибо мне еще скажешь".

"Will you look at that! The great Choirmaster, scared of my little whispers!" {n}Idira breaks into trills of laughter. Her mirth almost seems excessive.{/n} "Stop shaking, will you, old man. I'm gonna protect you and your bulgy-eyed pals from what's behind the door. You'll thank me yet."
languages.original_text: "Глядите-ка, великий хормейстер испугался моих шепотков!" {n}Идира заходится заливистым смехом. Кажется, что ей даже слишком весело.{/n} "Не трясись так, старый. Уберегу тебя и дружков твоих пучеглазых от того, что за дверкой, спасибо мне еще скажешь".

Her mirth almost seems excessive.{/n} "Stop shaking, will you, old man. I'm gonna protect you and your bulgy-eyed pals from what's behind the door. You'll thank me yet."

"Will you look at that! The great Choirmaster, scared of my little whispers!" {n}Idira breaks into trills of laughter. Her mirth almost seems excessive.{/n} "Stop shaking, will you, old man. I'm gonna protect you and your bulgy-eyed pals from what's behind the door. You'll thank me yet."

languages.text: «¡Una imagen para el recuerdo: el gran maestro del Coro, asustado de mis pequeños susurros!». {n}Idira estalla en carcajadas con una alegría casi excesiva.{/n} «Deje de temblar, anciano. Voy a protegerlos a usted y a sus amiguitos de ojos saltones de lo que hay al otro lado de la puerta. Ya me dará las gracias».
languages.original_text: "Will you look at that! The great Choirmaster, scared of my little whispers!" {n}Idira breaks into trills of laughter. Her mirth almost seems excessive.{/n} "Stop shaking, will you, old man. I'm gonna protect you and your bulgy-eyed pals from what's behind the door. You'll thank me yet."

traits.locale_text: «¡Una imagen para el recuerdo: el gran maestro del Coro, asustado de mis pequeños susurros!». {n}Idira estalla en carcajadas con una alegría casi excesiva.{/n} «Deje de temblar, anciano. Voy a protegerlos a usted y a sus amiguitos de ojos saltones de lo que hay al otro lado de la puerta. Ya me dará las gracias».

languages.text: 「見てみなさい！偉大なクワイアーマスターが、私の小さな囁きに怯えているわ！」{n}イディラは声を震わせて笑い出す。少し過剰に思えるほど明るい。{/n} 「震えなくていいわ、おじいさん。扉の向こうのアレから、あなたと目の膨らんだお仲間を守ってあげる。感謝することね」
languages.original_text: "Will you look at that! The great Choirmaster, scared of my little whispers!" {n}Idira breaks into trills of laughter. Her mirth almost seems excessive.{/n} "Stop shaking, will you, old man. I'm gonna protect you and your bulgy-eyed pals from what's behind the door. You'll thank me yet."

traits.locale_text: 「見てみなさい！偉大なクワイアーマスターが、私の小さな囁きに怯えているわ！」{n}イディラは声を震わせて笑い出す。少し過剰に思えるほど明るい。{/n} 「震えなくていいわ、おじいさん。扉の向こうのアレから、あなたと目の膨らんだお仲間を守ってあげる。感謝することね」

languages.text: “听听这都是些什么话！伟大的唱诗大师，居然害怕我脑子里那些小小的低语！”{n}伊迪拉笑得浑身发颤，快活得似乎有些过头了。{/n}“别瑟瑟发抖了，老家伙。我会保护你和你那些肿眼泡朋友，让你们不被门后的东西伤害，到时候好好感谢我吧。”
languages.original_text: "Will you look at that! The great Choirmaster, scared of my little whispers!" {n}Idira breaks into trills of laughter. Her mirth almost seems excessive.{/n} "Stop shaking, will you, old man. I'm gonna protect you and your bulgy-eyed pals from what's behind the door. You'll thank me yet."

traits.locale_text: “听听这都是些什么话！伟大的唱诗大师，居然害怕我脑子里那些小小的低语！”{n}伊迪拉笑得浑身发颤，快活得似乎有些过头了。{/n}“别瑟瑟发抖了，老家伙。我会保护你和你那些肿眼泡朋友，让你们不被门后的东西伤害，到时候好好感谢我吧。”

languages.text: "Sieh sich das einer an! Der große Chormeister hat Angst vor meinen kleinen Flüsterstimmen!" {n}Idira bricht in schrilles Gelächter aus. Ihr Amüsement wirkt fast schon übertrieben.{/n} "Hört auf zu zittern, alter Mann, ja? Ich beschütze Euch und Eure Kumpanen mit den hervorquellenden Augen vor allem, was hinter der Tür liegt. Ihr werdet mir noch danken."
languages.original_text: "Will you look at that! The great Choirmaster, scared of my little whispers!" {n}Idira breaks into trills of laughter. Her mirth almost seems excessive.{/n} "Stop shaking, will you, old man. I'm gonna protect you and your bulgy-eyed pals from what's behind the door. You'll thank me yet."

traits.locale_text: "Sieh sich das einer an! Der große Chormeister hat Angst vor meinen kleinen Flüsterstimmen!" {n}Idira bricht in schrilles Gelächter aus. Ihr Amüsement wirkt fast schon übertrieben.{/n} "Hört auf zu zittern, alter Mann, ja? Ich beschütze Euch und Eure Kumpanen mit den hervorquellenden Augen vor allem, was hinter der Tür liegt. Ihr werdet mir noch danken."

languages.text: « Voyez-vous ça ! Le grand maître de chœur tremble comme une feuille à la seule évocation de mes petits murmures ! » {n}Idira éclate d'un rire mélodieux à n'en plus finir, à tel point que son hilarité semblerait presque forcée.{/n} « Pas de panique, vieillard. Quoi qui nous attende derrière cette porte, je vous protégerai, vous et vos petits copains aux yeux globuleux. Vous me remercierez plus tard. »
languages.original_text: "Will you look at that! The great Choirmaster, scared of my little whispers!" {n}Idira breaks into trills of laughter. Her mirth almost seems excessive.{/n} "Stop shaking, will you, old man. I'm gonna protect you and your bulgy-eyed pals from what's behind the door. You'll thank me yet."

traits.locale_text: « Voyez-vous ça ! Le grand maître de chœur tremble comme une feuille à la seule évocation de mes petits murmures ! » {n}Idira éclate d'un rire mélodieux à n'en plus finir, à tel point que son hilarité semblerait presque forcée.{/n} « Pas de panique, vieillard. Quoi qui nous attende derrière cette porte, je vous protégerai, vous et vos petits copains aux yeux globuleux. Vous me remercierez plus tard. »

languages.text: "Bak sen şu işe! Koskoca Koro Şefi, minik fısıltılarımdan korkuyor!" {n}İdira, cıvıltılı bir kahkahaya boğuluyor. Neşesi neredeyse aşırıya kaçmış gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Titremeyi keser misin ihtiyar? Seni de pörtlek gözlü dostlarını da kapının ardındaki şeylerden koruyacağım. Bana sonra teşekkür edersin."
languages.original_text: "Will you look at that! The great Choirmaster, scared of my little whispers!" {n}Idira breaks into trills of laughter. Her mirth almost seems excessive.{/n} "Stop shaking, will you, old man. I'm gonna protect you and your bulgy-eyed pals from what's behind the door. You'll thank me yet."
